org.jppf.utils.stats

Class JPPFStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jppf.utils.stats.JPPFStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Iterable<JPPFSnapshot>

    public class JPPFStatistics
extends Object
implements Serializable, Iterable<JPPFSnapshot>
    Instances of this class hold statistics snapshots. To create and add a new snapshot, createSnapshot(String) should be called first, before any call to one of the addXXX() methods, in order to respect thread safety.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  JPPFStatistics.Filter
      A filter interface for snapshots.

      • getSnapshot

        public JPPFSnapshot getSnapshot(String label)
        Get a snapshot specified by its label.
        Parameters:
        label - the label of the snapshot to look up.
        Returns:
        a JPPFSnapshot instance, or null if none could be found with the specified label.

      • getSnapshots

        public Collection<JPPFSnapshot> getSnapshots(JPPFStatistics.Filter filter)
        Get the snapshots in this object using the specified filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - determines which snapshots will be part of the returned collection.
        Returns:
        a collection of JPPFSnapshot instances, possibly empty but never null.
